Actors: Alison Crosbie, Daniel Day-Lewis, Philip King, Emma Thompson
Writer: Gerry Conlon (autobiographical book "Proved Innocent"), Terry George (screenplay), Jim Sheridan (screenplay)
Title: In the Name of the Father
Plot: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.
Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 33 nominations.
